Name: Shotgun
Description: Target all enemies within a radius.

Name: Target
Description: Target enemy closest to mouse location.

Name: Propel
Description: Move indefinitely towards initial target direction.

Name: Spread
Description: Increase arc by 30 degrees per level.

Name: Reach
Description: Increase min radius by 1 tile per level.

Name: Depth
Description: Increase max radius by 1 tile per level.

Name: Expand
Description: Increase min and max radius over time by 1 tile per level per second.

Name: Shrink
Description: Decrease min and max radius over time by 1 tile per level per second.

Name: Barrier
Description: Drains/slows intersecting magic based on density.

Name: Weight
Description: Push any colliding enemies (apply knockback based on Speed).

Name: Charge
Description: Increase starting energy by 2 per level. Energy depletes at a rate of 1 per second.

Name: Absorb
Description: Drain a numerical value on the target(s) to fill the caster’s.

Name: Drain
Description: Reduce a numerical value on the target(s).

Name: Fill
Description: Increase a numerical value on the target(s).

Name: Randomize
Description: Randomize the selected value on the target (relative to original value)

Name: Bind
Description: Bind the targets to be affected by the next spell cast.
